title: Bioninformatics Resource Center Webinar Series
desc: The Bioinformatic Resource Centers (BRC) have partnered to present a joint webinar series on Respiratory Pathogens and the tools available for their study.

title: New PATRIC Online Bacterial Bioinformatics Course
desc: We have released a new online Bacterial Bioinformatics course, freely available through Coursera.

title: New PATRIC Video Tutorial Series
desc: We have released a series of new video tutorials for PATRIC services and associated functionality.

title: CANCELLED! - PATRIC/RAST Bacterial and IRD/ViPR Viral Workshops at Argonne National Laboratory
desc: The new Bacterial-Viral BRC (BV-BRC), a collaboration between the PATRIC/RAST and IRD/ViPR teams

title: PATRIC Data and Website Releases, September â€“ December 2019
desc: This PATRIC release includes a new Genome Assembly Service, new Heatmap Viewer, new analysis Job Scheduler, and over 31,000 new microbial genomes.

title: New Bioinformatics Hub at UChicago Enables Next-Gen Infectious Disease Research
desc: The new Bacterial and Viral Bioinformatics Resource Center (BV-BRC) combines two independent efforts at UChicago and the J. Craig Venter Institute (JCVI) into a common infrastructure that will support richer scientific data and more powerful analytic tools

title: PATRIC July Release: New Fastq Utilities Service
desc: The new Fastq Utilities Service provides the capability for aligning, measuring base call quality, and trimming fastq read files to estimate quality.
